mapper.select: select f.fishName, buy.location, f.unit, nvl(trunc((buy.total/buy.cnt)),0) as price, buy.cnt from fishList f, (select fishName, location, sum(price) as total, sum(weight) as cnt from buylist b group by fishName, location) buy where f.fishName = buy.fishName order by buy.cnt desc

select f.fishName, buy.location, f.unit, nvl(trunc((buy.total/buy.cnt)),0) as price, buy.cnt from fishList f, (select fishName, location, sum(price) as total, sum(weight) as cnt from buylist b group by fishName, location) buy where f.fishName = buy.fishName and f.SEASONINFO like '%' || #{season} || '%' order by buy.total desc
